title: EJ6120-03A
description: With sturdy stainless steel construction, crisp white dial, silver toned bezel and rich brown oxhide leather strap, it is designed for a stylishly active lifestyle. Accurate to within 20 seconds each month and possessing 2-year battery life, this is a timepiece you can depend on.

title: EJ6123-56A
description: Possessing crisp white dial and gorgeous rose gold tones, 2-years battery life and comfortably convenient push button buckle, this watch turns heads both with its looks and performance. Constructed from robust stainless steel, it is well equipped to meet the demands of your day.

description: The first pendant our designer ever created featured a safety pin dangling from a chain. Over time, he added more items to the chain, including a beat-up metal ring. The Bootleg is a replica of this piece, and a reminder of where it all started.

title: Binary - Black Gold
description: Composed of two chains that differ in gauge and finish, the Binary finds balance between opposing units. It looks calculated whether worn straight or asymmetrically, and was designed to layer seamlessly with other pendants.

title: White Dial Blossom & Rose Gold - OB16MDW36
description: We're in love with this dreamy pink midi dial design. From its pretty blossom-hued leather strap to its luxe rose gold-plated case, everything about the piece has got modern, feminine elegance covered. For a chic finish, the 30mm-wide dial is accented with metallic markers and our brand signature. Count on this style to elevate your work and weekend looks.

title: Case Cuff Black Dial & Gold - OB16CB07
description: It’s time to take your accessorising game to the next level. Like jewellery for your watch, our innovative case cuffs can be clipped on for extra impact or easily removed on days when you’re feeling a less is more vibe. Be the first to adorn your wrist with our exciting new design. This 38mm-wide gold-plated style is complemented by a soft, smooth black leather strap.

title: Dark Bouquet Black & Rose Gold - OB16WG42
description: Put an opulent twist on your outfits with our Dark Bouquet watch. The oversized design showcases rich blooms and a little butterfly across its black 38mm-wide dial. It's elevated by a rose gold-plated case and matching metallic markers, including Roman numerals at the 12 and 6 o'clock spots. The soft, smooth black leather strap fits like a dream too.

title: Dark Bouquet Black & Gold - OB16EG78
description: Add a little opulence to your everyday look with our Dark Bouquet watch. The hand-illustrated design showcases colourful blooms across a dark 38mm-wide dial. It's presented in a gold-plated case and accented with matching metallic markers. The soft, smooth black leather strap fits like a dream. We love that it's perfect for work and weekends too.

title: Watercolour Florals Grey Lilac, Rose Gold & Silver - OB16PP32
description: Introducing our Watercolour Florals collection. Delicate brushstrokes meet soft pastel colourways to create this pretty floral timepiece. Its 38mm-wide dial is housed in a silver-plated case and contrasted with rose gold markers, offering an easy way to work the mixed metal trend. The grey lilac strap is made from soft, supple leather that hugs the wrist beautifully.

title: Watercolour Florals Blush & Rose Gold - OB16PP31
description: Introducing our Watercolour Florals collection. Soft brushstrokes meet the prettiest pastel colourways to create this floral big dial watch. For a sleek touch, the 38mm-wide design is presented in a rose gold-plated case and elevated with matching metallic markers. It fastens with a supple blush-hued leather strap complete with a shiny rose gold buckle.

title: Floral Bouquet London Grey & Rose Gold - OB16FS99
description: An elevated way to get your floral fix, this big dial watch is embellished with a bouquet of rose gold 3D blooms. The 38mm-piece features a grey face, set within a rose gold-plated dial, with a deliberate lack of numerals to let the floral detailing take centre stage. Its soft leather strap comes in our cool London Grey hue.

title: Enchanted Garden Tan & Gold - OB16EG94
description: Prepare to charm with our Enchanted Gardens watch. Decorated with hand-illustrated blooms and a dainty butterfly, the 38mm-wide piece is a pretty way to update your everyday look. It fastens with a supple tan leather strap, featuring a gold-plated buckle and pin. Summer or winter, this style will see you through every season.

title: Enchanted Garden Rose Gold Mesh - OB16EG82
description: Inspired by enchanted gardens, this big dial watch displays whimsical blooms and a dainty butterfly across a 38mm-wide dial. It's housed in a rose gold-plated case and fastens with a mesh strap - perfect for adding a sleek touch. Layer it with our delicate rose gold rings and bangles, or contrast it with silver jewellery for a mixed metal look.

title: Embroidered Dial Black & Rose Gold - OB16EM02
description: Celebrating the beauty of artisanal crafts, this unique big dial watch features a textured canvas dial. The piece displays a rose gold bee surrounded by blooms, created using embroidery and hand-printing techniques. Its 38mm-wide dial is housed in a rose gold-plated case and complemented by a soft black leather strap. Wear with pretty jewellery styles to complete the picture.

title: Embellished Strap Vegan Rose Sand & Rose Gold - OB16ES15
description: A pretty, feminine way to update your everyday look, this big dial timepiece features a vegan-friendly strap in our soft rose sand hue. The strap is embellished with a dainty 3D bee stud, taking its appeal from subtle to striking. Its 38mm-wide white dial is housed in a luxe rose gold-plated case and elevated with matching metallic markers.

title: Case Cuff Grey Lilac & Silver - OB16CB05
description: It’s time to take your accessorising game to the next level. Like jewellery for your watch, our innovative case cuffs can be clipped on for extra impact or easily removed on days when you’re feeling a less is more vibe. This pretty style combines a clean white dial and a soft grey lilac leather strap. Be the first to adorn your wrist with our exciting new design.

title: After Dark Rose Suede & Matte Black - OB16AD26
description: Switch up your watch wardrobe with our After Dark timepiece. A moodier way to work the floral trend, the design showcases beautiful blooms across a 38mm-wide black dial. The piece is housed in a matte black IP case and contrasted by a soft rose suede strap. Wear with a dark nail polish for a rock 'n' roll edge.

title: Wonderland Vegan Rose Sand, Rose Gold & Silver - OB16WD66
description: A contemporary take on vintage aesthetics, this 30mm-wide midi dial timepiece will never go out of style. The feminine design features a white face and our rose sand vegan-friendly synthetic strap - perfect for putting a fresh, feminine twist on your outfits. The mixed metal style combines a brushed silver-plated case and rose gold markers. We love that it can be worn effortlessly with both silver and rose gold jewellery.

title: White Dial Gold Mesh  - OB16MDW35
description: An elevated everyday essential, this gold midi dial is a must-have staple for any watch collection. The design features a clean white 30mm-wide dial set within a gold-plated case. Its sleek gold mesh strap makes a flexible, comfortable fit for the wrist. Wear alone to channel low-key luxury or dress it up with our metallic jewellery styles.

title: Watercolour Florals Silver Mesh - OB16PP37
description: Created by our in-house designers using watercolour techniques, this mesh-strap timepiece is a little work of art. Its 30mm-wide dial blends soft brushstrokes and pretty pastel hues to create a floral design. The piece is presented in a silver-plated case and contrasted with rose gold markers - a perfect way to wear the mixed metal trend.

title: Social Butterfly Grey Lilac & Rose Gold - OB16MB13
description: Modern, pretty, feminine, this midi dial watch will put a fresh twist on your everyday look. The 30mm-wide white dial is presented in a rose gold-plated case and accented with a 3D butterfly motif. Its strap is made from the softest leather and comes in our grey lilac hue. We think it's a sweet gift for a social butterfly.

title: Social Butterfly Silver Mesh - OB16MB12
description: Part of our Social Butterfly collection, this midi dial watch scoops style points for sweet, sleek aesthetics. The T-bar design is made with a silver-plated case and a luxe mesh strap that offers an easy way to elevate your everyday look. Its 30mm-wide white dial is accented with a dainty butterfly motif at the 12 o'clock spot.

title: Queen Bee Rose Gold & Silver Mesh - OB16AM140
description: Sleek and sweet in equal parts, this midi dial design is accented with a dainty version of our signature 3D bee. The little metallic motif lives at the top of a 30mm-wide white dial alongside rose gold markers. The T-bar design wraps around the wrist courtesy of a silver-plated mesh strap. We think it's the perfect way to champion the mixed metal trend.

title: Queen Bee Grey Date Dial & Rose Gold Mesh - OB16AM122
description: The sweetest 3D bee motif makes this midi dial watch an instant way to add a little charm to your look. The 30mm-wide design -  complete with a date window - displays a chic grey dial in a rose gold-plated case. For precise timekeeping, the piece is powered by an accurate three-hand Japanese quartz movement. A sleek metallic mesh strap means the style works perfectly day to night.

title: Painterly Prints Grey & Rose Gold - OB16PP22
description: A little work of art for your wrist, this white midi dial forms a canvas for a delicately painted hummingbird surrounded by floral motifs. Soft colourways bring a feminine charm to the piece, which is housed in a rose gold-plated 30mm-wide case. Its grey leather strap wraps the wrist beautifully. Wear with everything, from jeans to a pretty skirt.

title: Blush Dial Blush & Rose Gold - OB16MD82
description: This midi dial design is a subtle, luxe way to upgrade your everyday look. A blush 30mm-wide dial nods to the millennial pink trend whilst rose gold markers add an elevated touch. Its soft leather strap, which hugs the wrist beautifully, also comes in our pretty blush hue. We love it because it works with practically every outfit.

title: Marble Floral Grey Lilac & Rose Gold - OB16CS14
description: Taking inspiration from reclaimed marble, this midi dial style features blossoming floral motifs across a white marble-effect dial - perfect for channeling two trends at once. The piece is presented in a 30mm-wide rose gold-plated case and powered by an accurate three-hand Japanese quartz movement. Its soft, smooth leather strap comes in our pretty grey lilac hue.

title: Lace Detail Sunray Rose Gold Mesh - OB16MV77
description: Set a luxe tone with this high-shine midi dial. Inspired by the fashion runways, the 30mm-wide design features delicate lace detailing across its sunray dial. The piece is housed in a rose gold-plated case and features a matching metallic mesh strap. We love this style because it promises to take any look from day to night.

title: Enchanted Garden Nude & Gold - OB16EG92
description: Sweet, colourful and feminine, this midi dial timepiece is a perfect way to accessorise your everyday look. Its 30mm-wide dial is embellished with hand-illustrated floral motifs and presented in a gold-plated case. The piece fastens with a soft, smooth blush leather strap. We love it styled with a white-tee-and-jeans combination or a pretty vintage dress.

title: Embroidered Dial Blush & Rose Gold - OB16EM06
description: Our Embroidered Dial collection has a unique artisanal appeal. This midi timepiece displays a little canvas dial that's lovingly embroidered and hand-printed to create a sweet bee and bloom design. The piece is presented in a rose gold-plated case and features our pretty blush leather strap. It's a little work of art for the wrist.

title: Case Cuff Nude & Gold - OB16CB10
description: It’s time to take your accessorising game to the next level. Like jewellery for your watch, our innovative case cuffs can be clipped on for extra impact or easily removed on days when you’re feeling a less is more vibe. Be the first to adorn your wrist with our exciting new design. This dreamy midi dial is elevated with a shimmering sunray dial and a nude leather strap.

title: Bejewelled Florals Midi 3d Bee Chalk Blue, Silver & Rose Gold - OB16BF07
description: Inspired by the catwalk embellishment trend, our Bejeweled Florals collection is all about opulent elegance. This 30mm-wide watch features hand-illustrated jewel details across a pastel floral-printed dial. Rose gold markers and a silver 3D bee offer an easy way to work the mixed metal trend. Its soft, smooth chalk blue leather strap is our new colour crush.

title: Bejewelled Florals Midi 3d Bee Black & Rose Gold - OB16BF05
description: Add instant opulence to your look with our Bejewelled Florals collection. Taking inspiration from the catwalk embellishment trend, this midi dial watch showcases hand-illustrated jewel details. Blossoming blooms and our signature 3D bee motif take its decorative appeal to the next level. The piece is elevated with a rose gold-plated case and a soft black leather strap.

title: Busy Bees Black & Rose Gold - OB16CH06
description: Shake up your watch wardrobe with this talking-point timepiece. The midi dial design features a 30mm-wide black face and a trio of intricately formed miniature 3D bees that move inside its rose gold-plated case. A soft black leather strap completes the look. Whether you let it elevate your everyday or evenings looks, this piece will take you from AM to PM.

title: Busy Bees Rose Gold Mesh - OB16CH01

description: Add a little opulence to your everyday look with our Dark Bouquet watch. The hand-illustrated design showcases colourful blooms across a dark 38mm-wide dial. Layer it with our delicate rose gold rings and bangles, or contrast it with silver jewellery for a mixed metal look.

title: Mahameru - MH005
description:
Pre-Order ini berlaku dari tanggal 31 Januari dan akan ditutup pada tanggal 5 Februari 2018 pukul 12 malam. Dengan program Pre-Order ini, Anda harus melakukan pembayaran full sekarang dan produk akan segera dikirim pada tanggal 8 Februari 2018. Estimasi pengiriman adalah 2-3 hari dari tanggal pengiriman.

The Mahameru design of pays homage to the classic dress watches from the 1950s such as 1954 Omega Seamaster, 1959 Rolex Tudor, and 1954 Ulysse Nardin. The design chose to revisit not only the design elements but also the spirit of 1950s classic watchmaking, an era where craftsmanship and quality come first, and beauty naturally comes out through utility rather than mere fashion accents.

title: Timex Camper MK1 x It's Nice That - TW2R78300
description: It’s Nice That’s collaboration with Timex brings the typographic heritage of both brand as together, with the customization of a military classic - the Timex MK1. Leipzig-based type collective Camelot has designed a typeface inspired by the letterforms of both It’s Nice That and Timex. The resulting character set has the look of a bold sans-serif, with a hand-rendered quality. A message in a sun-like roundel seals the watch with a positive pledge to each person who wears it: Nice Time Guaranteed.

title: Originals Modern Easy Reader 40th Anniversary - TW2R36000
description: Officially launched in 1977, we hare celebrating 40 years of our landmark Easy Reader® watch with a special edition collection. We have dressed up Easy Reader for the occasion, featuring a rich Horween® leather , in four classic and current trend-inspired styles. The 40th anniversary is noted on the case back,  lining and a special hidden message which can only be seen when the INDIGLO® night-light is activated.

title: G-SHOCK - GD-400MB-1DR
description: Introducing a new collection of basic-black additions to the popular Big Case Series. Touches of red and other colours provide great looking accents against the basic black of the cases, bands, digital displays, bezel lettering, and buttons. Super Illuminator and a 3-dial face, and the GD-400 comes with protector for the areas where the band joins the watch, which protect against impact from the back of the watch.

title: G-SHOCK - BA-110JM-1ADR
description:
These new additions to the popular BA-110 Series are done in semi-transparent colors that are so popular on the beach scene, and a mixed color molding process produces a gradation pattern in the case and band. Available colors are semi-transparent black in the subdued image of the evening sea, semi-transparent blue in the clear image of the summer sea, and semi-transparent orange in the image of the coastal sunset.
The bands of these models are also made of semi-transparent resin for uniformity of the design.
These distinctive models are great with both marine fashions and sports fashions.

title: MTP-1228D-7AVDF
description:
Treat yourself to an accessory that has ultimate in good looks and functionality. Constructed by master craftsmen, this wristwatch is unique in style, performance, and function, making it the definition of affordable luxury.
 
 Mixing it up, the Casio watch features intricate details that make it as much of a fashion item as a timepiece. It is made to withstand forces of impact, vibration, and everyday activities. title: AE-1200WHB-3BVDF
description: The AE1200 series, known for its multi-mission LCD and 10 year battery, is now available with cloth band for those who prefer cloth over resin or metal. title: Camper - MK1 Resin - TW2R13900
description: The Timex Archive project combines historical know-how with a refined design aesthetic, a true expression of values that Timex has passed on since 1854 to this day. Part of the Pioneers collection, the Camper MK1 model is a re-release of the first Camper model from the 80 has. A “civilian” version of the watch adopted by the US Army for its convenience and functionality.

title: Camper MK1 Resin - TW2R13800
description: The Timex Archive project combines historical know-how with a refined design aesthetic, a true expression of values that Timex has passed on since 1854 to this day. title: LIMA SORE - Timeloop
description:
LIMA watch x Nerdmob
presents TIMELOOP A knotted harmony of space and time,
The TIMELOOP entwines combination of passion between craftsmen
Meticulously crafted by hands, it layers a unity of heads in Sonokeling,
Maple, and Teak wood embodied on each watch and bracelet,
Symbolizing each cherished moments that each wearer has, a complete love
and purpose, faithfully kept within the loop of time,
concealed within precious teak wood box that holds the bond of connection
that lasts an eternity,
that eventually brings you infinity.

title: MARATHON - TW5M06800
description: Timex is an iconic American heritage watch brand renowned for its timeless designs. Founded in 1854, Timex has established a tradition of creating high-quality, innovative watches to suit the needs of every customer. Timex® watches have been a part of consumers ha lives for over 160 years, and today combine high-end Italian designs with cutting edge German engineering to offer customers quality products. With a large and varied line of watches, Timex has a style for everyone.

title: STYLE ELEVATED - TW2P99600
description: It has easy to see how this timepiece takes you from work to play. With simple elegance in mind, it says confidence with its modern, genuine leather  and oversized case.

title: Wristband Classic Petite Sheffield 28Mm
description: With an eggshell-white dial and all-black NATO , the Classic Petite Cornwall is a true eye-catcher. With a sleek design and a captivating essence, this is a modern Classic made for every occasion.

title: Classic Petite Cornwall 28Mm
description: With an eggshell-white dial and all-black NATO , the Classic Petite Cornwall is a true eye-catcher. With a sleek design and a captivating essence, this is a modern Classic made for every occasion.

title: Classic Petite Cornwall Black 28Mm
description: The Classic Petite Cornwall captures the pure essence of simplicity and style. Featuring an all-black NATO and a black dial, this clean and elegant watch easily becomes your everyday style companion.

title: Classic Petite Sterling 28Mm
description: Already a true design classic, the Classic Petite Sterling with a white dial has a contemporary edge and a fresh look. A stylish watch, modern and timeless at the same time.

title: Classic Petite Sterling Black 28Mm
description: The Classic Petite Sterling with a black dial is an outstanding combination of style and attitude. It is a true designer statement and the perfect watch for any occasion.

title: Classic Petite Melrose 28Mm
description: Classic Petite Melrose features an eggshell white dial and an undeniably elegant rose gold mesh . This watch elevates your everyday outfit, your mood and your spirit.

title: Classic Petite Melrose Black 28Mm
description: This Classic Petite Melrose features a black dial that accentuates classic elegance while adding a splash of refreshing attitude. This watch has you ready to go from office to rooftop party in the blink of an eye.

title: Classic Petite Ashfield 28Mm
description: Enter the new season in timeless fashion with Classic Petite Ashfield. This ultra-thin watch rests delicately on the arm and features a matte black mesh and a sophisticated black dial. Available with details in rose gold or silver.

title: Classic Petite Sheffield 28Mm
description: The Classic Petite with an eggshell white dial and a classic black Sheffield leather dresses you up for any occasion. A true design icon.

title: Classic Petite St Mawes Black 28Mm
description: Classic Petite with the black dial and the St Mawes is an alluring, neat combination. St Mawes is one of our most sought after s made from genuine Italian leather.

title: Classic Petite St Mawes 28Mm
description: The white dial of the Classic Petite really stands out in its minimalist beauty together with the luster in the timeless St Mawes . St Mawes is one of our most sought after s made from genuine Italian leather.

title: Classic Petite Sheffield Black 28Mm
description: Classic Petite with the black dial in rose gold or silver is the perfect match with the alluring leather in the Sheffield . A true eye-catcher that never will go unnoticed.

title: Classic Petite Reading 28Mm
description: White meets black in this gorgeous combination of clean minimalism and classic croc embossed black leather. Suit up or pair with jeans and t-shirt for a more casual look.

title: Classic Petite Bristol Black 28Mm
description: The Classic Petite watch with the black dial and Bristol accentuates effortless elegance. This distinctive combination will never go out of style. Available in rose gold or silver.

title: Classic Petite Bondi 28Mm
description: Classic Petite Bondi, with its fresh white leather and an eggshell white dial, signals both simplicity and grace. This ultra-thin watch rests delicately on the arm and highlights that extra bit of fresh energy in your style. Available in rose gold or silver.

title: White Dial Chocolate & Rose Gold - Ob16Bdw32
description: A sophisticated watch is a must-have accessory to manage your time in style. Add a touch of luxe to your look with this elegant oversized 38mm-wide Rose Gold dial. Complemented alongside a stylish Chocolate leather , this modern style gives a sweet and fashionable edge.

title: Marble Floral Grey Lilac, Rose Gold & Silver - Ob16Mf05
description: Our new must-have collection combines marble effect dials and on-trend florals for a unique and edgy look. Featuring a 38mm-wide Marble Floral Silver plated dial complemented with Rose Gold markers and a soft and feminine Grey Lilac leather , be prepared for Marble Florals to take centre stage.

title: Marble Floral Dark Grey & Rose Gold - Ob16Cs08
description: Look to this botanical timepiece for a new way to work the floral trend. The 38mm-wide big dial design works the prettiest pink and lilac blooms across a chic grey backdrop, taking its colour inspiration from a slab of reclaimed grey marble. Its rose gold-plated case and colour-coordinating markers bring a luxurious dimension to the design, which is finished with a dark grey leather .

title: Lace Detail Blush & Rose Gold - Ob16Mv53
description: Add a little luxe to your look with this stunning oversized 38mm-wide Rose Gold sunray dial. Featuring a raised ornate lace detail combined with a Blush leather , this intricate style is set to be every fashionista as must-have watch this season. Also available in Grey & Rose Gold mesh.

title: 3D Bee Embellished  Grey & Rose Gold - Ob16Es13
description: Inspired by the embellishment trend seen on the catwalk, this statement watch features our signature 3D bee on its soft grey leather . For a luxe look, the 38mm-wide design works rose gold-plated casing and matching metallic markers across a clean white dial. We love it because it has simple enough for everyday wear yet striking enough for special occasions.

title: 3D Bee Embellished  Rose, Matte Black & Rose Gold - Ob16Es09
description: Inspired by the embellishment trend seen on the catwalk, this striking watch features our signature 3D bee on a soft rose suede . For a high-contrast effect, the 38mm-wide big dial is encased by matte black IP casing. Rose gold-plated markers, including a set of Roman numerals for a classic twist, elevate the dark dial. This is a feminine style with a super-cool attitude.

title: Big Dial Nude Peach & Rose Gold - Ob16Bd94
description: A sophisticated watch is a must-have accessory to manage your time in style. Add a touch of luxe to your look with this elegant oversized 38mm-wide Rose Gold sunray dial. Complemented alongside a soft Nude Peach leather , this modern and unique style gives a contemporary and fashionable edge.

title: Big Dial Dark Grey, Rose Gold & Silver - Ob16Bd90
description: Mix up your metals with a sophisticated twist on our staple oversized dials. Featuring a 38mm-wide Grey sunray effect dial, Silver case with Rose Gold markers and chic Grey leather . This is one statement watch perfect for everyday style.

title: Black Dial & Rose Gold Mesh - Ob16Bd89
description: Dare to be bold! This striking 38mm-wdie Black Dial and Rose Gold case will add impact to any outfit. Combined with a Rose Gold mesh for ultimate statement style.

title: After Dark Nude Peach, Matte Black & Rose Gold - Ob16Ad25
description: Part of our After Dark collection, this timepiece champions a feminine, edgy attitude at once. A work of contrasts, the big dial design combines a striking matte IP black case with a soft nude peach leather . Its 38mm-wide dial is accented with luxurious rose gold markers, including a set of Roman numerals for a classic twist.

title: Abstract Florals Rose Gold Mesh - Ob16Vm15
description: Part of our Abstract Florals collection, this fashion-forward timepiece displays a sand-blasted face with a screen-printed abstract effect. The mesh design is taken to the next level by applied rose gold anemone blooms, which are scattered across its 38mm-wide dial. We think it strikes the perfect balance between artistic and chic.

title: Signature Florals Silver Mesh - Ob16Wg30
description: The Signature Florals have become synonymous with the Olivia Burton brand. Featuring anemones, peonies and butterflies - they are cute, feminine and pretty as a picture! Make it mesh with this Midi 30mm-wide Silver dial and mesh , the perfect on-trend accessory for any wardrobe.

title: Signature Floral Navy & Rose Gold - Ob16Wg13
description: Rich in colour and pattern, this timepiece works our hand-illustrated signature florals across a dark midnight dial. A soft, smooth navy leather complements the 30mm-wide midi design, which is housed within a rose gold-plated case. Coordinating markers and the Olivia Burton brand signature add beautiful finishing touches. Stack alongside our delicate rose gold bangles for added impact.

title: Midi White Dial Grey Lilac & Rose Gold - Ob16Mdw32
description: Working the colour of the moment, this pretty, elegant timepiece features a soft grey lilac-coloured leather . It strikes a perfect balance between modern and classic, mixing a clean white dial and a set of Roman markers. A rose gold-plated case enhances the design. Wear yours to elevate your everyday looks.

title: Midi White Dial Burgundy & Gold - Ob16Mdw31
description: Rich and versatile, Burgundy steps into the spotlight as the colour of the season! Featured on a soft leather it is complemented by a 30mm-wide classic White dial. A statement-style that as set to steal the spotlight.

title: White Dial Navy & Rose Gold - Ob16Mdw06
description: Keep it classic with this elegant 30mm-wide Midi Dial featuring a Navy , Rose Gold case and beautiful White dial.

title: Midi 3D Vintage Bow Embellished  Black & Rose Gold - Ob16Vb07
description: Perfect for making sweet style statement, this timepiece features our signature 3D bow motif on a soft black leather . The design works a 30mm-wide black midi dial that has accented with rose gold markers. Subtle yet striking, the piece is one you can wear through the day and into the night. Team it with our bow-embellished jewellery styles for high-impact styling.

title: Midi Grey Dial Dark Grey & Silver Mesh - Ob16Md80
description: This simple yet striking timepiece has a go-with-anything appeal. Working a mixed metal design, the watch combines a silver-plated mesh and case, and rose gold markers. Its 30mm-wide midi dial comes in a cool grey hue that will stay chic forever. Wear with anything, anytime, anywhere.

title: Midi Grey Dial Grey, Rose Gold & Silver - Ob16Md79
description: Channel understated elegance with this subtle timepiece. The 30mm-wide midi dial design features a grey face and a soft grey leather that tap into a contemporary mood. Rose gold-plated markers introduce luxe colour contrasts to the dial, which is also accented with the Olivia Burton brand signature. Wear with everything from jeans to dresses.

title: Midi Dial Marble Floral Rose Gold Mesh - Ob16Cs06
description: A new way to work your florals, this decorative watch is accented with flourishing blooms across a marble-effect dial. The piece is lovingly designed from start to finish by designers at our East London studio, who opt for a rose gold-plated mesh for a luxe twist. Metallic markers, including a set of Roman numerals, and the Olivia Burton brand signature add chic finishing touches.

title: Lace Detail Black & Rose Gold - Ob16Mv75
description: Welcome a luxe, delicate addition to your look with this decorative timepiece. Inspired by lace couture, the design has rose gold-plated dial is decorated with raised ornate detailing that instils a feminine mood. A soft, smooth black leather complements the black face. We think it has the perfect mix of feminine and fashion-forward.

title: 3D Daisy Black & Rose Gold - Ob16Fs97
description: Inspired by 1960s floral prints, this decorative midi dial watch is a perfect summertime statement. Our signature 3D daisy motif – brought to life using the most intricate crafting techniques – is housed within its rose gold-plated 30mm-wide case. A soft black leather brings a versatile goes-with-anything allure to the design.

title: Midi 3D Bee Embellished  Tan & Gold - Ob16Es14
description: A subtle way to wear our signature 3D bee, this midi dial design is embellished with a miniature motif on its soft tan leather . Its 30mm-wide white dial is set within a gold-plated case and accented with coordinating markers, including a set of Roman numerals for a traditional touch. Whether it has summer or winter, day or night, this versatile style looks beautiful 24/7.

title: Midi 3D Bee Embellished  Grey Lilac & Rose Gold - Ob16Es11
description: Make a subtle yet striking statement with our midi dial watch. Inspired by the embellishments seen on the catwalks, the soft grey lilac leather is accented with a dainty 3D bee motif that has brought to life with intricate detailing. Its 30mm-wide clean white dial is housed within a rose gold-plated case. Colour-coordinating markers add a luxe finishing touch.

title: Enchanted Garden 3D Bee Embellished  London Grey & Rose Gold - Ob16Es06
description: Inspired by enchanted gardens, this timepiece features whimsical hand-illustrated florals across a white 30mm-wide midi dial. Its rose gold-plated case and matching markers take the piece in a luxe direction. A dainty butterfly motif embellishes its soft leather , which comes in our cool London Grey hue. Wear with everything from jeans to dresses.

title: Enchanted Garden 3D Butterfly Embellished  Grey Lilac & Rose Gold - Ob16Es05
description: From its whimsical floral-printed dial to its dainty embellishment, our Enchanted Garden timepiece is all about attention to detail. The 30mm-wide midi dial is set within a luxe rose gold-plated case and complemented by a colour-coordinating butterfly stud, which features on a soft grey lilac leather . Stack it alongside our butterfly-inspired jewellery styles for extra impact.

title: 3D Bee Embellished  Rose Gold & Silver Mesh - Ob16Es04
description: Combining our love of nature and the catwalk embellishment trend, this timepiece features dainty 3D bee motifs on a silver-plated mesh – perfect for adding a little personality to your look. Its 30mm-wide white midi dial is housed in a rose gold-plated case and accented with silver markers. We love it because it can be worn easily with mixed metal jewellery.

title: Midi 3D Bee Vegan Friendly Black & Rose Gold - Ob16Ve10
description: A true statement-maker, this 30mm-wide midi dial timepiece scoops unique style points for its embellished face. Its rose gold-plated case is home to our signature 3D bee motif – exclusive to Olivia Burton. A soft, smooth black vegan-friendly leather means the design feels extra-comfortable to wear. Pair it with our little bee-inspired jewellery designs for super-pretty styling.

title: Busy Bees Rose Gold & Silver Mesh - Ob16Ch02
description: Inspired by the ‘waggle dance ha that honey bees do to let others know when they have found food, this striking timepiece features floating metallic bees that move inside the glass. Its 30mm-wide white dial, rose gold markers and silver-plated mesh create a clean, luxe colour palette. Shake your wrist to see the bees dance.

title: After Dark Floral Vegan Friendly Black & Ip Black - Ob16Ve11
description: Taking florals in a darker direction, this decorative timepiece showcases rich blooms across a dark 30mm-wide midi dial. The design features matte black IP casing that has a cool, contemporary attitude. Rose gold markers make luxe styling simple, whilst a soft vegan-friendly black leather means that you can be fashionable in a sustainable way.

title: After Dark Floral Matte Black, Black & Silver - Ob16Ad22
description: Part of our After Dark collection, this striking timepiece works moody purple floral motifs across a dark 30mm-wide dial. Cool and contemporary, the design features matte IP black casing and a smooth black leather . Silver markers introduce luxe highlights. Add it to your watch collection for an easy way to work florals with attitude.

title: Abstract Florals Blush & Rose Gold - Ob16Vm12
description: This on-trend timepiece works a sand-blasted face, featuring a carefully screen-printed abstract effect on top. It has taken to new heights by applied rose gold anemones that dance across its 30mm-wide dial. The design is finished with a blush leather . We think it strikes the perfect balance between artistic and super-chic.

title: Abstract Florals Midi Rose Gold Mesh - Ob16Vm11
description: Part of our Abstract Florals collection, this on-trend timepiece works a sand-blasted face that features a carefully screen-printed abstract effect on top. It has taken to new heights by applied rose gold anemone blooms, which dance across a 30mm-wide midi dial. A rose gold-plated mesh continues the luxe mood.

title: After Dark Floral Big Square Dial Matte Black & Rose Gold - Ob16Ad17
description: Contemporary and cool, our After Dark collection has had a Square Dial makeover! Designed with a polished 30mm-wide Matte Black case. Turn heads with this edgy floral printed dial completed with a genuine Black leather .

title: Square Dial 3D Bee Black & Rose Gold - Ob16Am128
description: Add a little character to your wrist with this decorative timepiece. Inspired by nature, the design is embellished with our signature 3D bee motif in rose gold. A black watch face and a coordinating soft leather bring a versatile go-with-anything appeal to the piece. Look to its simple square dial to switch up your watch wardrobe.

title: Ring Lloeren - Zbr-150916
description:
Lloeren ring; An edgy contemporary ring that gives the illusion as if the circle if floating on the surface of the back of your hand. Simple band is hidden and shaped ergonomically, making it comfortable to wear. A hammered finish applied as the collection signature style.
 
 All pieces are wrapped in high gloss finish. Hand-sculpted, scored, bent, soldered, brushed and hammered in Bali.

title: Sua - Ss/Rg
description: One of our most design-forward pieces, the Sua is a pendant first-and-foremost. But this teardrop-shaped piece can also be taken off the chain and worn as a slick flat-top ring. Give the chain a half-twist before clasping in order to make it sit flat on your chest.

title: Sua - Gold
description: One of our most design-forward pieces, the Sua is a pendant first-and-foremost. But this teardrop-shaped piece can also be taken off the chain and worn as a slick flat-top ring. Give the chain a half-twist before clasping in order to make it sit flat on your chest.

title: Strejk - Matte Black
description: This geometric lightning bolt takes its name from the Swedish word for “strike.” Toss on this pendant to add a little spark to your outfit.

title: Kusari - Matte Black 7,5
description: One of the many weapons in the arsenal of Japan has ninjas, the Kunai had humble beginnings as an ancient farming tool. However, its deadly strength and shape made it an effective weapon in hand-to-hand combat, and the kunai was even used for climbing the sides of buildings to infiltrate enemy compounds. We like to think this pendant is just as versatile as the real thing.

title: Tzu - Antiqued Steel Size 7,5
description: Taking its name from Sun Tzu, the Taoist philosopher and Chinese military general who penned The Art Of War, this bracelet is all about balance. A tightly woven chain-link is countered with a leather  — two opposing forces that work together rather than against each other.

title: Maile - Matte Black Size 7,5
description:
Taking its name for the ancient word for “armour,” the Maile is designed to resemble the protective chainmail worn by European warriors throughout history. This thick stainless steel bracelet is weighty enough to hold its own, but gets even stronger as you stack smaller bracelets around it.
 
 NOTE: Sizes fit the same as our other bracelets, but the Maile measures slightly shorter (i.e. Size 8 fits like Size 8 but measures 7.5”)

title: Perlen - Stainless Steel Size 7,5
description: “Perlen” is the German word for “beaded.” Made from 100% genuine leather with hits of polished stainless steel, the Perlen is our contemporary take on the classic beaded bracelet. Put it to work by wearing it beside a watch or stacking it on with other bracelets.

title: Perlen - Matte Black Size 7,5
description: “Perlen” is the German word for “beaded.” Made from 100% genuine leather with hits of polished stainless steel, the Perlen is our contemporary take on the classic beaded bracelet. Put it to work by wearing it beside a watch or stacking it on with other bracelets.

title: Fizz - Gold
description: A throwback to some of our favourite childhood memories, the Fizz is our tribute to those blistering summer days where sipping soda is only thing you can do to keep cool.

title: Hakken - Stainless Steel Size 8
description:
Based on the design of our classic Sequoia pendant, this axe-shaped cuff takes its name from the Dutch word for “chop.” It has a fitting title for a piece that will keep you looking seriously sharp.
 
 Comes in size 7 and 8 but can be stretched slightly to accommodate in-between sizes.
 
 NOTE: The antiquing process differs from piece to piece. The item you receive may look slightly different than what is pictured here.

description: This piece spent almost two years in production, and during this time it was referred to only as the “bird beak.” Finally in its finished form, the Corvus features a weighty, angular pendant with an eye-catching effect.

Dubbel - Matte Black Size 7,5
description: This double-wrap bracelet is crafted from 100% genuine leather, meaning it has as tough as it looks. With a minimalistic magnetized clasp, the Dubbel stacks effortlessly with other bracelets and watches, but is more than substantial enough to hold its own.

title: Dubbel - Gold Size 8,5
description: This double-wrap bracelet is crafted from 100% genuine leather, meaning it has as tough as it looks. With a minimalistic magnetized clasp, the Dubbel stacks effortlessly with other bracelets and watches, but is more than substantial enough to hold its own.

title: Alpen - Stainless Steel
description: Longtime fans of Vitaly may recognize this design, as it is based on one of our early wood pieces. Now made entirely from stainless steel, the new-and-improved Alpen pendant features a randomized geometric pattern on a dog-tag style pendant.

title: Alpen - Matte Black
description: Longtime fans of Vitaly may recognize this design, as it is based on one of our early wood pieces. Now made entirely from stainless steel, the new-and-improved Alpen pendant features a randomized geometric pattern on a dog-tag style pendant.

title: Cirkel - Stainless Steel Size 7,5
description: One of our thinnest bracelets, the Cirkel is designed to be worn in a stack. It pairs effortlessly with our beaded bracelets and watches, but its ultra-clean clasping mechanism gives it enough subtle shine to be worn on its own.

title: Toba White Nato France
description:
NAM is Indonesian based timepiece brand and they have already known to have the best high quality material that implemented in each of their product.
 Toba watch is inspired by mount Toba which was once has the biggest volcano in the world, and now it is famous because of its beautiful lake.

title: Bn0231Whwhlal
description: In 1971, Braun launched a series of travel alarm clocks and watches. The infamous German industrial designers, Dieter Rams and Deitrich Lubs were the masterminds behind the project; and, with their “Less, is more” design philosophy they produced a number of memorable products for Braun including some of the best travel alarm clocks around. Over the last 40 years, Braun time pieces were characterized by their pure, highly functional and timeless design with no superfluous details: Every feature directly reflects a function. Rooted in over half a century of modern design at Braun, the core values of functionality, quality and aesthetics are reflected in all clocks and watches. The strength of clarity and simplicity of their design makes them a pleasure to use and to own.

title: No.3 TR90 Grey - Grey Silicone Wristband
description:
The No.3 explores the non-polluting TR90 which is a durable and lightweight material
 in a transparent finish that gives the case an unadorned look whilst keeping the
 monochromatic appearance. A peeled watch that comes in a range of seven different
 face colours together with a matching silicone wristband. The only noticeable
 branding is punched into the side. Available in one size: 38 mm.

title: B Issue 29 Ace Hotel
description: Ace Hotel got its start in 1999 when Alex Calderwood and HIS FRIENDs renovated an old halfway house in Seattle, transforming it into a small hotel. By absorbing the cultural heritage of surrounding communities and collaborating with various artists and brands, Ace Hotel creates its own collection of hotels, each possessing their own look and feel. Ace Hotel has not only helped to revive neightborhoods, but it has also breathed new life into the entire hotel industry.

title: Multi Noon
description:
The Multi is the second collaboration series between multidisciplinary design studio Daniel Emma and AÃRK.
 
 Rethinking conventional timepiece finishings and pairings, the Multi takes a playful approach to design through the use of colour. Multiple hues come together to create bold yet balanced combinations in wearable palettes.
 
 Featuring a two tone leather  in supple calf leather and matte case colours with a sandblasted texture, this watch houses a reliable Japanese Quartz Movement protected by a scratch resistant mineral glass lens.

title: Rose Gold
description: The Rose Gold bracelet is the essence of modern luxury and classic sophistication. With our signature anchor plated in rose gold, blue trim line and pink whipping twine. This is the ultimate accessory for all occasions.

title: Ice Blue
description: As a staple in the newer line of our bracelets, the Ice Blue combines the timeless blue trim line with a bright blue whipping twine, creating a beautiful mixture of classic and modern. The Ice Blue is handcrafted to perfection on Sweden is southernmost point, with a pure sterling silver anchor.

title: Southern Green
description: The Southern Green offers a sophisticated look that combines a versatile blue trim line, green whipping knot details and the signature sterling anchor. The Southern Green is the the one-lap choice and handcrafted to perfection in the southernmost point of Sweden, with a pure sterling silver anchor.

title: Southern 3
description: The Southern 3 offers a sophisticated look that combines a versatile blue trim line, green whipping knot details and the signature sterling anchor. The Southern 3 is handcrafted to perfection in the southernmost point of Sweden, with a pure sterling silver anchor.

title: Coral Pink
description: As a staple in the newer line of our bracelets, the Coral Pink combines the timeless blue trim line with a bright pink whipping twine, creating a beautiful mixture of classic and modern. The Coral Pink is handcrafted to perfection on Sweden is southernmost point, with a pure sterling silver anchor.

title: Atlantic 3
description: The Atlantic 3 is the classic Tom Hope look - a timeless design that combines a versatile blue trim line, bright red whipping knot details and the signature sterling anchor. The Atlantic 3 is handcrafted to perfection in the southernmost point of Sweden, with a pure sterling silver anchor.

title: Triple Black
description: Introducing the brand new Triple Black - a luxurious and powerful edition. A truly one of a kind bracelet inspired by furious storms on the darkest seas. With our sterling silver anchor plated in black platinum (rhodium), black whipping twine and a black trim line, this is the ultimate accessory for all occasions. It comes in a custom all black box.

title: Arctic Blue
description: Powerful yet discreet - the Arctic Blue bracelet makes a statement with its bright red colour and blue details. Yet with its one lap around the wrist it is able to seamlessly blend in with most outfits. The Arctic Blue is handcrafted to perfection in the southernmost point of Sweden, with a pure sterling silver anchor.

title: Arctic 3
description: The Arctic 3 bracelet makes a statement with its bright red colour and blue details, allowing you to showcase the adventurer in you. The Arctic 3 is handcrafted to perfection in the southernmost point of Sweden, with a pure sterling silver anchor.

title: Pacific Red
description: Our Pacific Red bracelet is timeless and beautiful with a solid brass anchor, handcrafted to perfection on Sweden is southernmost point.

title: Atlantic Red
description: The Atlantic Red is the classic Tom Hope look - a timeless design that combines a versatile blue trim line, bright red whipping knot details and the signature sterling anchor. The Atlantic Red is the one-lap choice and handcrafted to perfection in the southernmost point of Sweden, with a pure sterling silver anchor.

title: Mediterranean Green
description: The Mediterranean Green bracelet is a discreet yet beautiful companion, with a pure brass anchor. Timeless and beautiful, handcrafted to perfection on Sweden is southernmost point.

title: Tom Hope 24K
description: The latest edition in the Tom Hope family is a powerful combination of gold coloured whipping twine and a pure brass anchor dipped in gold. The bracelet exudes confidence and the yellow golden shimmer with the matching waxed whipping twine makes this the finest bracelet we have ever made, and a really special accessory. The 24K One puts even more focus on the golden details with just one lap around the wrist. Like all our bracelets the Tom Hope 24K One is handcrafted to perfection in Sweden.

title: SECONDS GMT  SILVER 36
description:
The Seconds GMT, tracking two time zones simultaneously, is the ideal traveling companion. A robust yet graceful piece made for adapting into different worlds. At first glance this watch may appear simple and straight forward, but upon further reflection the wearer will perceive the subtle interplay between the different treatment of surfaces and appealing high-end materials.
 
 Seconds GMT comes with a durable and washable* micro fibre wristband. The wristband is made from 100% recyclable ecological Italian micro fibre with stainless steel buckles.
 
 *Use hand wash

title: One Carbon - Men
description:
Inspired by supercars, the adrenaline-fueled ZINVO One uses carbon fiber — an exceptionally tough material often found on the fastest cars in the world. The carbon fiber motif is front and center on the ZINVO One//Carbon with the distinct pattern blanketing both the bezel and dial. The exotic car theme carries on further with hour-markers reminiscent of car pedals and a caseback that is designed to look like a multi-spoke wheel.
 
 Housing the carbon fiber dial and bezel of the ZINVO One//Carbon men has watch is a sleek 45mm black stainless steel case. The monochromatic look of the wristwatch is emphasized by its black Italian leather  with matching black stitching and black steel tang buckle engraved with the ZINVO logo.
 The engine beneath the hood of the ZINVO One is an ultra reliable and precise Swiss-made quartz movement to drive the hours, minutes, seconds, and date functions.

title: Blade 12K Gold - Men
description: ZINVO has signature model, the Blade watch boasts a patent-pending dial design where a rotating turbine disc replaces the traditional seconds hand. A men has watch that stands out from the rest, the ZINVO Blade is made with the young, fashion-forward, and dynamic crowd in mind. Plated with GOLD 12k.

description: A sturdy pack built for busy days. Slip your laptop into the internal sleeve and head out to the other side of town, confident your gear is safe and your look is sound. A trusty colleague.

title: Austin - Army Socks
description: The best of yesterday and today: a heritage design pack with pockets for laptop and waterbottle

title: PA:GI - MICKEY
description:
Lima watch is a wooden watch brand and is the first product launched by Lima, a designstudio based in indonesia which specializes in creating natural& simple lifestyle products.
 
 Lima watch was made with a simple philosophy in the mind of the designer, "adding value to a small pieceof wood with good design"

title: PA:GI - DONALD
description:
Lima watch is a wooden watch brand and is the first product launched by Lima, a designstudio based in indonesia which specializes in creating natural& simple lifestyle products.
 
 Lima watch was made with a simple philosophy in the mind of the designer, "adding value to a small pieceof wood with good design"

title: DW-6900MS-1JF
description:
These models represent some of the very best of the tough and durable G-SHOCK design in basic G-SHOCK black.
 In addition to the band, even the watch is buttons are ion plated to a black finish.
 The DW-5600MS, DW-6900MS, and G-9000MS are equipped with a light-on-dark digital display to match the overall color theme.

title: DW-6900-1
description: 200-meter water resistance and a convenient EL backlight display packed into a design that is tough, rugged, and fashionable.

title: GA-110LP-3ADR
description:
From the G-SHOCK lineup of watches that are always setting new standards for toughness comes a new Punching Pattern Series that incorporates a sporty new design.
 The design is based on a mesh material motif that is used in caps, bags, T-shirts, and other sports fashion items. Holes punched in the band allow for the passage of ventilating air, and bonding different colored resin together creates a sporty design.
 Three of the models are available in a choice of subdued matte finish colors: black, green, or white.

title: GA-110LP-1ADR
description:
From the G-SHOCK lineup of watches that are always setting new standards for toughness comes a new Punching Pattern Series that incorporates a sporty new design.
 The design is based on a mesh material motif that is used in caps, bags, T-shirts, and other sports fashion items. Holes punched in the band allow for the passage of ventilating air, and bonding different colored resin together creates a sporty design.
 Three of the models are available in a choice of subdued matte finish colors: black, green, or white.

title: GD-400-9DR
description:
Introducing a collection of G-SHOCK models with face protectors that are so popular for young aficionados of skateboarding and other street sports. Classic designs are freshened up with a choice of five different color variations.
 These models come with protector for the areas where the band joins the watch, which protect against impact from the back of the watch. High-luminosity LED lighting provides easy reading, even in the dark.

title: GR-8900A-1DR
description:
Introducing a selection of new designs for the GR-8900 model. The round digital dial is designed with more multi-dimensional depth for a distinctive look.
 The light button is front mounted and bigger for easier operation. Pressing the button turns on a high-luminosity LED for easy reading in the dark. The Tough Solar power system is designed to generate enough electricity to feed the bright face light and other power-hungry functions.

title: GD-350-1BDR
description:
This new G-SHOCK is designed and engineered for those special dark, secret missions that demand something extra. The timer function is has a large, specially designed easily identifiable dedicated button for quick and sure operation under the toughest of conditions. When the timer reaches the end of its countdown, you can select to be alerted by either a vibration operation or a tone plus LED flash operation. The special shock absorber design of the back of the watch helps to ensure that vibration is felt by the writs.
 A high luminance LED can be configured to light for one, three, or five seconds, and an Auto Light feature cause the face to illuminate whenever the watch is tilted towards the face for reading.

title: G-6900-1
description:
These Tough Solar models provide a choice of either the original G-5600 G-SHOCK design or the G-6900 design that is so popular among followers of today is street fashions.
 The Tough Solar system, which is equipped without changing the basic design of the watches, makes it possible to generate enough power to keep the watch running with minimal exposure to normal lighting.
 The simple designs of these watches were achieved by eliminating as much coloring and decoration as possible. The result is two models that capture the essence of the basic G-SHOCK.

title: G-9000-3 Mudman
description:
Introducing the dust-resistant, dirt-resistant MUDMAN with Dual Illuminator.
 MUDMAN is designed and engineered with people like motor sport mechanics in mind. Its Mud Resist construction seals out everything from the oil of workshop to the sand of motorcycle rally. A Dual Illuminator backlight can be configured for 3-second or 5-second afterglow for easy reading in the dark.
 Dual 1,000-hour stopwatches allow simultaneous measurement of two times, which means you can use one stopwatch to time a race and the other to determine how much time is being lost in pit stops. The back cover is engraved with the image of a mole, which represents the MUDMAN concept.
 
 DUAL ILLUMINATOR
 Dual EL panels provide simultaneous illumination of the LCD panel and the dial for better readability when available lighting is dim.

title: G-9100-1-Gulfman
description:
From G-SHOCK, the watch that delivers the ultimate in modern personal timekeeping, comes a GULFMAN model that packs powerful features and functions into a tough rest-resistant configuration. All external metal parts, including screws, back cover, buckle, and even button shafts are made of titanium alloy for total protection, even in seawater environments.
 The band is secured to the case by milled titanium alloy screws, while the form of the forged titanium alloy back provides outstanding impact resistance.
 The band is configured so it does not adhere to the wrist when wet.
 Functions include Tide Graph for current tide conditions at a glance, Moon Phase Graph for graphic display of moon phases, and Dual Illuminator for simultaneous illumination of the display and its periphery.

title: DW-5600E-1
description: A slapshot by a professional hockey player was all it took to send this G-Shock into history and into a goalie has mitt, literally. If it can handle a slapshot, it can handle your life. We like to refer to it as the quintessential G-Shock.

title: G-5600E-1
description:
These Tough Solar models provide a choice of either the original G-5600 G-SHOCK design or the G-6900 design that is so popular among followers of today is street fashions.
 The Tough Solar system, which is equipped without changing the basic design of the watches, makes it possible to generate enough power to keep the watch running with minimal exposure to normal lighting.
 The simple designs of these watches were achieved by eliminating as much coloring and decoration as possible. The result is two models that capture the essence of the basic G-SHOCK.

Timex® watches have been a part of consumers ha lives for over 160 years, and today combine high-end Italian designs with cutting edge German engineering to offer customers quality products. title: BNE001BK calculator
description: This Braun calculator is the reissue of the Braun ET66 calculator, one of Braun is most iconic designs, which was collaboratively designed by Dietrich Lubs and Dieter Rams and originally released in 1987. The Braun ET66 calculator is considered to be the pinnacle of the less but better philosophy thanks to its simple, rectangular design with convex, circular buttons.This calculator measures 82mm x 139mm x 16mm and includes a protective slide cover. Battery included.

title: O.TIME-6
description:
Our today has range, O.Time -the third development of DIETRICH- illustrates perfectly our philosophy. A humanistic approach of aesthetics and time. An approach that celebrates life, sensuality and pleasure.
 
 These timekeepers are highly tactile, soft and comfortable, while their inner details are illustrating our organic complexity, embodying mechanical tensions, force transmissions, time measurement.

title: Brian Redman Stainless
description: Brian Redman has remarkable racing career encompassed one of the most exciting and dangerous eras in motorsport. From the mid 1960s through the late 1970s, Brian drove to victory in many of the greatest cars of the period, from the Ford GT40 to the Porsche 908 and 917, as well as the Ferrari 312 PB, Alfa Tipo 33 and BMW CSL. His popularity and skill as a driver is one of the few things Porsche fans and Ferrari fans can agree on, and his roster of team mates reads like awho has whoof the Prototype Era. In addition to his illustrious career in endurance racing, Brian was also Formula 5000 champion 3 times in a row from 1974-1976. A living legend, Brian continues to be involved directly with vintage racing, and still can be seen behind the wheel of many of his former racing machines. Autodromo is very proud to present this limited edition chronograph commemorating Brian has victory at the 1969 Nurburgring 1000km race with team mate Jo Siffert.

title: Passport Sleeve - Tan
description:
FOR THE MINIMALIST TRAVELLER...
 
 Our Passport Sleeve is a specialist style that offers protection for your passport, while adding extra features like a handy pen for custom forms and slots for the cards you need when on the move. The signature Bellroy pull-tab also provides quick access to your documents. Experienced travellers pack slim.

title: High Line - Tamarillo
description:
THE SLIM WALLET THAT LOVES FLAT BILLS
 
 We have crafted the High Line for the minimalist that doesn hat want to fold their bills, and kept it beautifully simple. Optimized for tall currencies, this is our slimmest wallet for the Japanese yen, euro and UK pound. Cards sit portrait, with leather that tapers in around the edges, so pockets stay smooth and super slim.

title: Micro Sleeve - Tamarillo
description:
A MINIMALIST SLEEVE FOR CASH AND CARDS
 
 This sleeve makes easy work of storing and accessing your bills. A pinch opens the central pocket – ideal for folded bills – it has a breeze to slide cash in and out. External slots fit up to 4 cards, quick to reach when you need them the most, and the central pocket can hold a couple more. Super slim, the Micro Sleeve smooths away pocket lines, for a tailored fit.

Super slim, the Micro Sleeve smooths away pocket lines, for a tailored fit.

title: PXR5-SI/NY
description: The PXR-5 was originally launched in 2005 by british designer Michael Young. Its futuristic stainless steel case features a digital LCD display and is akin to a belt buckle that is attached to the wrist by a utilitarian, woven nylon . The PXR5 now has its home in the permanent collection of VOID Watches.

title: PXR5-BR/MU
description:
The PXR-5 was first produced in 2005, as one of Michael Young has first projects after relocating his studio to Asia.
 
 It features a futuristic, enlarged digital screen within a stainless steel case, akin to a belt buckle that is attached to the wrist by a utilitarian, woven nylon .
 
 To celebrate its tenth year, the PXR-5 is now making a comeback under the stewardship of VOID Watches. The legacy of this iconoclastic design timepiece lives on through an incredible new collaboration.

title: Card Pocket - Java
description:
THE LITTLE WALLET THAT HOLDS A LOT
 
 Zip up your cards and cash in our smallest pocket. A neat all-rounder for those who want to carry very little, the Card Pocket has a secure coin pouch and storage for your stacking frequently-used cards. With a handy slot for a spare SIM card, you hall find room for business cards too.

title: Sond - BE/BL/BE
description: SOND by VOID Watches is a truly unique timekeeper. Injection molded in one single piece, the SOND has an innovative locking mechanism that uses the watch itself to secure the nylon watchband. This not only greatly reduces the number of moving parts but also creates an interesting contrast of colors and materials.

title: V03M-BL/BL
description:
The V03M is the first ever mechanical watch from VOID Watches. Powered by the trusted automatic 8215 movement from Japanese manufacturer Miyota, the watch draws its power from the continuous movement of your wrist and will run perpetually as long as you occasionally move. The design is inspired by the last five decades of watch design using familiar elements and color schemes. The caseback features a see-through window showing the intricate 21 jewelled Japanese watch movement.
 
 This version of the watch comes with a calf leather  with a matching stainless steel buckle.

title: VO1MKII-SI/MR
description:
The V01MKII offers a modern, minimalist take on watch design. The square stainless case with it has half sapphire glass front is our signature piece and recognized by design lovers around the world. A sand blasted surface treatment gives the watch a sophisticated, matte appearance while the scratch resistant sapphire crystal protects the high contrast LCD display. The 5ATM water resistance provides safe protection against the elements.
 
 This version of the watch comes with a Milanese style stainless steel bracelet that can be adjusted to fit almost any wrist.

title: Light Hours
description: When a 40 mm stainless steel case takes shelter under an ion plated silver coating with the dial dressed in white, a subtle seduction is created by the power of the design. The task of powering this beauty falls to an IsaSwiss quartz movement, driving silver hour/minute hands over black markers and a red seconds hand and date display.

title: Dark Hours
description: With its 40 mm diameter, brushed stainless steel case adorned with a DLC (Diamond Like Carbon) coating, the Essential proudly shows off its sleek design as a standard. Its matt black dial displays hours, minutes, seconds, day and date with the precision of its IsaSwiss Calibre 9232/1950 quartz movement personalized by GREYHOURS.

title: Seconds Rose Gold
description: Nocs Atelier Seconds challenges you to view time through your own unique lens. The watch is produced using a multilayered process that is equal parts cutting-edge technology and human ingenuity. Seconds ha composition consists of a two-part lugged 40mm sandblasted steel 316 case with a chamfered bezel in brushed finish. The case houses a pair of individual three-hand quartz Japanese movements with a four-year battery life. The PVD-coated, matte finish dial integrates with your choice of silver or gold second hands.

title: Ault - Burgundy 20mm
description:
The NATO watch originates from the British Military back in 1973 and was usually made of nylon fabric. As a way to give the classic piece another twist, The Ault NATO  is made from Voyej has signature American vegetable tanned leather.To make it more durable, rather than being glued, the buckle is secured with hand stitched artificial sinew on two sides and machine stitched nylon threads on the other sections.
 
 One of notable details on The Ault NATO  design is the blade shaped tip. It fulfills the functional value required of a NATO  for its shape makes it easier to wear, as well as to take off the . The other detail is the craftsman has mark,which intended as a decorative border.
 
 Available in two sizes; 18mm and 20mm withthree color options; Natural, Burgundy, and Black.
 
 AULT
 
 The Ault NATO Watch  adopts its name from the USS Ault (DD-698) which was a destroyer in the US Navy. Built by Federal Shipbuilding and Drydock Company, Kearny, New Jersey Ault was laid down 15 November 1943, launched 26 March 1944. Ault was commissioned 31 May 1944 and later decommissioned on 16 July 1973.
 
 The Phase x Voyej Product range is a direct reflection of the collaborative synergy between our two groups. With our product names embracing Voyej has concept that takes inspiration from the ocean, and the various vessels that journey across the open seas.

title: Classic Neu Silver
description: The Classic Neu is a refined range based on the original Classic Premium launched in early 2014. Expanding on a core aesthetic influenced by geometry and clean lines, this iteration balances a slimmer profile with minimal hands and AÃRK has iconic dodecagon index.Made from a high grade 316L Stainless Steel, the Classic Neu is case protects its precise Japanese Quartz Movement from water damage and the shock of hard knocks. In addition to a custom-moulded triangle crown exclusive to AÃRK, this watch has unique look comes courtesy of an independent second hand, while the premium Italian calf leather band maximises comfort and wearability.Ageless pairings of colour and material, coupled with an improved unibody case for a streamlined look defines the Classic Neu as the perfect contemporary piece for everyday style.

title: Classic Reading 40mm
description: The Classic Reading from the flagship Classic collection has been designed for simplicity and effortless elegance, and features a black crocodile leather band, an eggshell white dial and an ultra-thin 6mm case. Whether you are attending a formal event, playing a game of tennis or enjoying a sunny day at the country club – Daniel Wellington makes for a beautiful companion. Not only that, but with interchangeable s you will have a unique timepiece for every day of the week.

title: Classic Durham 40mm
description:
With its eggshell white dial, minimalistic case and elegant light brown leather , made from American leather, the Classic Durham is a stunning addition to the flagship Classic collection. The ultra-thin (6mm) watch is suitable for every occasion, and is available in both rose gold and silver.
 
 The Durham leather  is made of genuine American leather, and has been treated with vegetable oil.Due to the nature of oily leather, the  will lighten in color when bent or stretched.
 
 The  color may vary, and variations in grain, texture and natural markings are not considered defects. Daily activities including sun exposure, handling, water, and conditioning will aid this natural process.

title: Camper MK1 Ltd. Edition - ABTMK1LTD
description: Timex celebrate the timeless elegance of a masterpiece in this 30th anniversary reissue of the Camper MK1. Originally destined to be a true disposable watch, the MK1 was built to withstand damage and then be thrown away. Now remastered for the modern gent, this civilian version resembles the military model with its easy to read, strong and lightweight features. Government issued to the US Army in 1982, this reissue is a limited edition rewokring of an archival timepiece.

title: Intelligent Quartz Fly Back Chronograph - T2N700
description: Crafted from a solid casting of steel, this not-quite-traditional chronograph pleases your senses--from the curves of its anatomy to the tactile experience of its pushers. But the dial is the most striking feature. Independent bi-directional hands measure time and fly back like the dashboard gauge of a sports car.

title: Maverick 3HD Silver White - Honey Brown Leather
description: The Maverick watches come with a high-legible face, created with 2 layers of hand-applied dials and cutout hour markers. To maximize wrist presence, the watch exterior is designed with bold angles, and carefully finished in a mixture of brushed and polished surfaces. The Maverick watches are powered using Miyota has quartz movements.The Maverick comes in an industrial 44mm lugged stainless steel case, and is available in chronograph and 3-hand-date options.

title: PXR5-BR/NY
description:
The PXR-5 was first produced in 2005, as one of Michael Young has first projects after relocating his studio to Asia.
 
 It features a futuristic, enlarged digital screen within a stainless steel case, akin to a belt buckle that is attached to the wrist by a utilitarian, woven nylon .
 
 To celebrate its tenth year, the PXR-5 is now making a comeback under the stewardship of VOID Watches. The legacy of this iconoclastic design timepiece lives on through an incredible new collaboration.

title: Nato Tarmac 22mm
description:
The 01NATO stands as the firstborn of HyperGrand has watch designs.
 With a breakthrough design comprising a highly readable double layered dial and irresistible straight-lined case structure – This is the design that catapulted HyperGrand into the watch world.
 Finished with a sandblasting technique, the 01NATO watch plays well with both smart and casual get-ups.

 With a breakthrough design comprising a highly readable double layered dial and irresistible straight-lined case structure – This is the design that catapulted HyperGrand into the watch world.
 Finished with a sandblasting technique, the 01NATO watch plays well with both smart and casual get-ups.

title: ORIGINALFAKE KAWS COMPANION RESTING PLACE GREY
description: OriginalFake now releases their own statement in the form of a KAWS Companion toy. Entitled Resting Place, the 9-inch vinyl figurine depicts Companion as a figure divided in half. One half sees a grey and white-edition Companion, while the other gives a glimpse into the innards of the iconic character. The piece asserts several ideas in a relatively simple form–of the temporality of life, the relationship between a brand and its creator, and more–all of which are underlined by the medium by which it is expressed

title: Coin Fold Wallet - Black
description:
THE ALL-ROUNDER WITH QUICK ACCESS TO COINS, CASH AND CARDS
 
 For folk that want to keep their valuables together. A pinch opens the coin pouch and releases a leather ridge, making it easy to tip coins out and avoid those awkward fumbles. Made from just 3 panels of leather, the back section includes a latch to hold your contents secure, and coins sit flat to keep bulk to a minimum.

title: Element Travel - Slate
description:
PROTECT YOUR TRAVEL ESSENTIALS
 
 Featuring a water-resistant zip and heavy-duty leather, the Elements Travel keeps your essentials protected in tricky situations. Inside, there has a travel pen for customs forms, a slot specifically for your passport, room for multiple currencies, and even enough space for your iPhone. Sure beats a beige body belt.

title: Elements Phone Pocket iPhone 6+ Slate
description:
ALL-WEATHER PROTECTION FOR A LARGE PHONE, CASH AND CARDS
 
 Keep your everyday essentials in one place, protected from the elements. Made from all-weather leather, the Elements Phone Pocket Plus fits a large phone, passport, cards, notes, coins, key and SIM card. A water-resistant zip offers you peace of mind too, as it secures your valuables into the Pocket has remarkably slim silhouette. Now go trek through a sandstorm, or ride in the rain.

title: Travel Wallet - Slate
description:
FIT ALL OF YOUR TRAVEL DOCUMENTS IN YOUR POCKET
 No more beading with nervous sweat as you shuffle through your bags, looking for your passport. The Travel Wallet enables you to keep all of your important documents in one place while fitting snugly in your pocket. With two note sections, a tailored passport pouch, card slots and even a handy pen, the only thing you need to worry about is making sure you get a window seat on the plane.

title: Hide & Seek Wallet - Black
description: Traditional in appearance, progressive in features. The Hide & Seek is for those who want more out of their wallet, while remaining true to existing aesthetics. Holding all of the money and cards you could need, it helps separate items you use more often from those that are important but needed less. The unique hidden flap means large bills can be concealed from view, while the flat pack storage section helps stack away cards in a secure location.

title: Note Sleeve Wallet - Tan
description: A wallet should fit to your lifestyle rather than force you to fit into it. Our Note Sleeve incorporates first-rate construction and a slim silhouette that enables you to alternate between work and play with ease. The Note Sleeve hits the sweet spot of functionality and efficiency, with a range of innovative features that do away with pocket bulge. It stores flat bills and coins, with easy-access slots for your daily cards and a storage area with a convenient pull tab for infrequent cards.

title: Carry Out Wallet - Java
description: The portfolio that also has a pocket option. With room for all major global currencies the Carry Out lets you organize your phone, cash, cards, coins and even a passport in one place. The removable sleeve inside doubles as a fully functional wallet, for when you want to head out with just the essentials on hand. It folds in half like a regular billfold and then snaps back in place with magnets when returned to the main wallet. Ideal for those who want to carry a lot, then a little.
